text: Can be identified in the field by anyone with a bit of experience. Species with which the beginner rapidly becomes familiar. Usually identifiable from a photo.
Can be identified in the field with care and experience. May be identifiable from a good photo.
Identification only accepted from known recorders or else needs confirmation from vice county recorder or UK Ladybird Survey.
Species needs confirmation from national expert or UK Ladybird Survey.
Voucher specimen required to be examined by national expert or UK Ladybird Survey.
